research_works.title: Study of Renewable Energy Sources
research_works.summary: This research work examines the feasibility of implementing renewable energy sources in the local community. It analyzes the potential of solar, wind, and biomass energy as sustainable alternatives.

research_works.title: Advancements in Artificial Intelligence
research_works.summary: The paper explores recent advancements in artificial intelligence and its applications in various industries, including healthcare, finance, and autonomous systems.

admission_process.eligibility_criteria: Candidates must have completed high school with a minimum of 50% marks.

admission_process.application_process: Prospective students can apply online through the college website or offline by obtaining an application form from the admissions office.

admission_process.selection_process: Admission is based on a combination of academic performance and performance in the college's entrance examination.

event_description: The Annual Cultural Fest is a celebration of diversity and creativity. Students showcase their talents in various art forms, music, dance, and theater performances.
